item.title: Php Laravel Controller Not Found
item.description: 问题描述 Route::get('/task', 'TaskController@index'); 报错 ： controller [TaskController] does not exist 解决方案： use App\Http\Controllers\TaskController; # 新增 ... Route::get('task', [TaskController::class, 'index']); Route::get('task/read/{id}', [TaskController::class, 'read']); 或者 Route::get('/users', 'App\Http\Controllers\TaskController@index');
